forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain between noon and 3pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. West wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn light drapes over Downtown San Francisco with a muted grayness, a prelude to the day ahead, where the promise of rain whispers softly in the air. A slight chance of showers dances between noon and three o'clock, beckoning you to prepare for the gentle touch of droplets. The clouds loom like specters overhead, a thick blanket muffling the warmth that normally graces this vibrant city. As the day unfolds, temperatures will descend ever so subtly, leaning toward a brisk 54 degrees—a reminder to wrap yourself in layers to guard against the creeping chill.

The marine layer, typical for this time of year, hangs low like a curtain, though it offers a hint of the golden hues of the distant bridge and the enchanting skyline—evidence of San Francisco's undying allure beneath muted skies. While the day may offer only the subdued beauty of a cloudy panorama, it is the perfect opportunity to traverse the quieter streets, perhaps indulging in a leisurely stroll at the waterfront or settling into a cozy café for a moment of solace. Seek the warmth of a good book or the glow of a warm cup of coffee as you embrace the understated elegance of a day that asks for simple pleasures over grand adventures.
